question: [File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/eager.rs] [Function: load_script()] [Script cache eviction] What is the script cache eviction policy, and can an attacker deliberately trigger cache evictions to force expensive re-verification of legitimate scripts, degrading validator performance? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/eager.rs] [Function: unmetered_deserialize_and_cache_script()] [Cache size limits] Is there a maximum cache size, and what happens when it's reached - can cache overflow cause crashes or undefined behavior? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/eager.rs] [Function: check_dependencies_and_charge_gas()] [Gas metering precision] Are gas charges for dependencies calculated precisely, or can rounding errors accumulate in deeply nested dependency chains to cause undercharging? (Low)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/eager.rs] [Function: build_instantiated_function()] [Function object lifecycle] When are instantiated function objects freed, and can memory leaks in long-running transactions accumulate until validator OOM? (Medium)
